name: DIZZY CHRISTMAS CAPER
description:
;--------------------------------------;

Title:
Dizzy Christmas caper
Author: 3mx digital(2020) yearly christmas themed game. 
;--------------------------------------;

;--------------------------------------;
;CONTROLS
LEFT/RIGHT arrow keys - move
SPACEBAR - Jump
UP arrow key - Pickup/interact
DOWN arrow key - Drop item
F1- clear save
P - pause
;--------------------------------------;

;--------------------------------------;
STORY:

That nasty wizard zaks has egg napped all the yolk folk and Dizzy forgot to get their gifts.

It's up to Dizzy to rescue his friends and family, save Daisy and defeat that rotten wizard once again. 
;--------------------------------------;

;--------------------------------------;
